 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָבַד‎</span><sub>290</sub> **verb** ==work, serve== (Old Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎עבד‎</span> ***do make***, especially Nabataean, Palmyrene (often), [[BDB#Ldzb|Lzb]]<sup>331 f.</sup> [[BDB#Cook|Cook]]<sup>86</sup>, so [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲבַד‎</span>, Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> (very often); but also Old Aramaic Phoenician <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עבד‎</span> ***slave, vassal*** (and in many proper names), [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַבְדָּא‎</span>, Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***id.***; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***abdu***</u></abbr>, ***id.*** (rare); Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָבַד‎</span> ***serve, performs acts of worship*** (with accusative of congnate meaning with verb), and derivatives; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***worship, obey*** (God); compare [[BDB#We|We]]<sup>Skizzen iii. 165</sup>; Heid. 141, II. ***enslave***; <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***slave, worshiper***; Sabean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עבד‎</span> ***id.*** [[BDB#DHM|DHM]]<sup>Südar. Alt. p. 18</sup>; [[BDB#Gerber|Gerber]]<sup>Verb. Denom. 14 ff.</sup> thinks ***be slave, serve*** (Qal) and ***enslave*** (Hiph\`il) are denominative, compare also [[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>ZMG xl (1886), 741</sup>); — 

**Qal**<sub>272</sub> ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> [[Ezek.29.18|Ezek 29:18]] +; suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲבָדוֺ‎</span> [[Mal.3.18|Mal 3:18]] +; 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָֽבְדוּ‎</span> [[Deut.7.4|Deut 7:4]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָבָ֑דוּ‎</span> [[Num.4.26|Num 4:26]], + 64 t. Perfect; ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַעֲבֹד‎</span> [[Gen.25.23|Gen 25:23]] +; suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַעַבְדֵ֫נִי‎</span> [[Exod.4.23|Exod 4:23]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַעַבְדֶ֫נּוּ‎</span> [[Ps.22.31|Ps 22:31]]; [[2Kgs.10.18|2Kgs 10:18]] 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַעַבְדוּ‎</span> [[Deut.12.30|Deut 12:30]] +; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַעֲבֹ֑דוּ‎</span> [[Gen.15.14|Gen 15:14]] ([[BDB#Dr|Dr]]<sup>§ 103</sup>) [[Job.36.11|Job 36:11]] 2 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּעַבְדוּן‎</span> [[Exod.3.12|Exod 3:12]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּעֲבֹד֑וּן‎</span> [[Josh.24.15|Josh 24:15]], + 99 t. Imperfect; (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תָּעָבְדֵם‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָָֽעָבְדֵם‎</span> see **Hoph\`al**); ***Imperative*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲבֹד‎</span> [[1Sam.26.19|1Sam 26:19]] suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָבְדֵהוּ‎</span> [[1Chr.28.9|1Chr 28:9]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עִבְדוּ‎</span> [[Exod.5.18|Exod 5:18]] + 15 t.; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲבֹ֑דוּ‎</span> [[Ezek.20.39|Ezek 20:39]] suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עִבְדֻהוּ‎</span> [[1Sam.7.3|1Sam 7:3]] ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲבֹד‎</span> [[Mal.3.14|Mal 3:14]] +; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲבָדֿ‎</span> [[Jer.34.9|Jer 34:9]]; [[Jer.34.10|Jer 34:10]] suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָבְדוֺ‎</span> [[Jer.27.6|Jer 27:6]] +, etc.; ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֹבֵד‎</span> [[Gen.4.2|Gen 4:2]] +; plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֹבְדִים‎</span> [[Num.18.21|Num 18:21]] +; construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֹבְדֵי‎</span> [[Ps.97.7|Ps 97:7]] +; suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֹבְדָיו‎</span> [[2Kgs.10.19|2Kgs 10:19]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֹבְדֵיהֶם‎</span> [[Zech.2.13|Zech 2:13]] — 

**1.** ***labour, work, do work:*** absolute [[Exod.20.9|Exod 20:9]] = [[Exod.34.21|Exod 34:21]] = [[Deut.5.13|Deut 5:13]] (4th word); [[Exod.5.18|Exod 5:18]] ([[BDB#E|E]]) [[Eccl.5.11|Eccl 5:11]] with accusative of thing, ***till*** the ground [[Gen.2.5|Gen 2:5]]; [[Gen.3.23|Gen 3:23]]; [[Gen.4.2|Gen 4:2]]; [[Gen.4.12|Gen 4:12]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[2Sam.9.10|2Sam 9:10]]; [[Isa.30.24|Isa 30:24]]; [[Jer.27.11|Jer 27:11]]; [[Zech.13.5|Zech 13:5]]; [[Prov.12.11|Prov 12:11]]; [[Prov.28.19|Prov 28:19]] object omitted [[Deut.15.19|Deut 15:19]]; [[Ezek.48.19|Ezek 48:19]] vineyard [[Deut.28.39|Deut 28:39]] garden [[Gen.2.16|Gen 2:16]] ([[BDB#J|J]]); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֹבְרֵי פִשְׁתִּים‎</span> [[Isa.19.9|Isa 19:9]] ***workers in flax***; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֹבְדֵ(יׅ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָעִיר‎</span> [[Ezek.48.18|Ezek 48:18]]; [[Ezek.48.19|Ezek 48:19]] ***labourers of the city***; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲבֹדָתוֺ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> [[Isa.28.21|Isa 28:21]] ***work his work*** (only here of God, \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עשׂה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַעֲשֵׂהוּ‎</span>); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עבדה על‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> [[Ezek.29.18|Ezek 29:18]] ***serve a military service against***. 

**2.** ***work for another, serve him by labour:*** absolute [[Exod.21.2|Exod 21:2]] ([[BDB#E|E]]); with accusative pers [[Gen.29.15|Gen 29:15]]; [[Gen.31.6|Gen 31:6]]; [[Exod.21.6|Exod 21:6]] ([[BDB#E|E]]) [[Deut.15.12|Deut 15:12]]; [[Deut.15.18|Deut 15:18]]; [[Mal.3.17|Mal 3:17]]; [[Jer.34.14|Jer 34:14]], king his people [[1Kgs.12.7|1Kgs 12:7]] subject animals [[Jer.27.6|Jer 27:6]]; [[Job.39.9|Job 39:9]] with accusative of person and thing [[Gen.30.26|Gen 30:26]] (twice in verse); [[Gen.30.29|Gen 30:29]] ([[BDB#J|J]]); with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְ‎</span> person [[2Sam.16.19|2Sam 16:19]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עִם‎</span> [[Gen.29.25|Gen 29:25]]; [[Gen.29.30|Gen 29:30]] ([[BDB#E|E]]) [[Lev.25.40|Lev 25:40]] ([[BDB#P|P]]); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עִמָּדִי‎</span> [[Gen.29.27|Gen 29:27]] ([[BDB#E|E]]); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִפְנֵי‎</span> [[2Sam.16.19|2Sam 16:19]] (twice in verse); with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּ‎</span> of price [[Gen.29.18|Gen 29:18]]; [[Gen.29.20|Gen 29:20]]; [[Gen.29.25|Gen 29:25]]; [[Gen.31.41|Gen 31:41]] ([[BDB#E|E]]) [[Hos.12.13|Hos 12:13]]; [[Ezek.29.20|Ezek 29:20]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּ‎</span> person***work by means of another, use him as slave***, [[Exod.1.14|Exod 1:14]]; [[Lev.25.39|Lev 25:39]]; [[Lev.25.46|Lev 25:46]] ([[BDB#P|P]]) [[Jer.22.13|Jer 22:13]]; [[Jer.25.14|Jer 25:14]]; [[Jer.27.7|Jer 27:7]]; [[Jer.30.8|Jer 30:8]]; [[Jer.34.9|Jer 34:9]]; [[Jer.34.10|Jer 34:10]]. 

**3.** ***serve as subjects:*** usually with accusative, their own chiefs or kings [[Judg.9.28|Judg 9:28]] (twice in verse); [[Judg.9.38|Judg 9:38]]; [[1Sam.11.1|1Sam 11:1]]; [[1Kgs.5.1|1Kgs 5:1]] +; other kings, by tribute [[Ps.18.44|Ps 18:44]] = [[2Sam.22.44|2Sam 22:44]]; [[Jer.27.7|Jer 27:7]]; [[Jer.28.14|Jer 28:14]]; [[2Kgs.25.24|2Kgs 25:24]] +, other nations [[2Sam.10.19|2Sam 10:19]]; [[Jer.40.9|Jer 40:9]]; [[Zech.2.13|Zech 2:13]] +, kings other kings [[2Kgs.18.7|2Kgs 18:7]] +, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְ‎</span>, [[1Sam.4.9|1Sam 4:9]] (twice in verse); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַס עֹבֵד‎</span> [[Gen.49.15|Gen 49:15]] ([[BDB#J|J]]) [[Josh.16.10|Josh 16:10]]; [[1Kgs.9.21|1Kgs 9:21]] (see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַס‎</span>); with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּ‎</span> person, ***work with***, i.e. use as subjects, impose tribute upon, [[Jer.25.14|Jer 25:14]]; [[Jer.27.7|Jer 27:7]]; [[Jer.30.8|Jer 30:8]]; [[Ezek.34.27|Ezek 34:27]]. 

**4.** ***serve*** God: 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** with accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>, [[Exod.3.12|Exod 3:12]]; [[Exod.4.23|Exod 4:23]]; [[Exod.7.16|Exod 7:16]]; [[Exod.7.26|Exod 7:26]] ([[BDB#J|J]][[BDB#E|E]]), [[Ps.22.31|Ps 22:31]]; [[Job.21.15|Job 21:15]]; [[Mal.3.14|Mal 3:14]] +; with accusative of person and thing [[Exod.10.26|Exod 10:26]] ([[BDB#E|E]]); accusative of person omitted, [[Jer.2.20|Jer 2:20]] (read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶעֱבוֺד‎</span> [[BDB#Kt|Kt]]), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עבד זבח ומנחה‎</span> [[Isa.19.21|Isa 19:21]] ***serve with peace-offering and grain-offering***; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עבד עֲבֹדָה‎</span> [[Exod.13.5|Exod 13:5]] (of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַצֹּת‎</span>). 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** other gods, with accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎א‎</span> [[Deut.7.16|Deut 7:16]]; [[Deut.12.2|Deut 12:2]]; [[Deut.12.30|Deut 12:30]] ; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אלהים אחרים‎</span> [[Deut.7.4|Deut 7:4]]; [[Deut.8.19|Deut 8:19]]; [[Deut.11.16|Deut 11:16]]; [[Deut.13.7|Deut 13:7]]; [[Deut.13.14|Deut 13:14]]; [[Deut.17.3|Deut 17:3]]; [[Deut.28.14|Deut 28:14]]; [[Deut.28.36|Deut 28:36]]; [[Deut.28.64|Deut 28:64]]; [[Deut.29.25|Deut 29:25]]; [[Deut.30.17|Deut 30:17]]; [[Deut.31.20|Deut 31:20]]; [[Josh.23.16|Josh 23:16]]; [[Josh.24.2|Josh 24:2]]; [[Josh.24.16|Josh 24:16]]; [[Judg.2.10|Judg 2:10]]; [[Judg.10.13|Judg 10:13]]; [[1Sam.8.8|1Sam 8:8]]; [[1Sam.26.19|1Sam 26:19]]; [[1Kgs.9.6|1Kgs 9:6]]; [[1Kgs.9.9|1Kgs 9:9]]; [[2Kgs.17.35|2Kgs 17:35]]; [[2Chr.7.19|2Chr 7:19]]; [[2Chr.7.22|2Chr 7:22]]; [[Jer.11.10|Jer 11:10]]; [[Jer.13.10|Jer 13:10]]; [[Jer.16.11|Jer 16:11]]; [[Jer.16.13|Jer 16:13]]; [[Jer.22.9|Jer 22:9]]; [[Jer.25.6|Jer 25:6]]; [[Jer.35.15|Jer 35:15]] (all [[BDB#D|D]] and Jeremiah); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֱלֹהֵי הַגּוֺיִם‎</span> [[Deut.29.17|Deut 29:17]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎זָרִים‎</span> [[Jer.5.19|Jer 5:19]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כל צבא השׁמים‎</span> [[Deut.4.19|Deut 4:19]]; [[2Kgs.21.3|2Kgs 21:3]]; [[2Chr.33.3|2Chr 33:3]]; [[Jer.8.2|Jer 8:2]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הבעל(יםׅ‎</span> [[Judg.2.11|Judg 2:11]]; [[Judg.3.7|Judg 3:7]]; [[Judg.10.6|Judg 10:6]]; [[Judg.10.10|Judg 10:10]]; [[Judg.1.10|Judg 1:10]]; [[Judg.1.31|Judg 1:31]]; [[Judg.22.54|Judg 22:54]]; [[2Kgs.10.18|2Kgs 10:18]] (twice in verse); [[2Kgs.10.19|2Kgs 10:19]] (twice in verse); [[2Kgs.10.21|2Kgs 10:21]]; [[2Kgs.10.22|2Kgs 10:22]]; [[2Kgs.10.23|2Kgs 10:23]] (twice in verse); [[2Kgs.17.16|2Kgs 17:16]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אלהי נֵכָר‎</span> [[Josh.24.20|Josh 24:20]]; [[Jer.5.19|Jer 5:19]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎(הַ)גִּלּוּלִים‎</span> [[2Kgs.17.12|2Kgs 17:12]]; [[2Kgs.21.21|2Kgs 21:21]] (twice in verse); [[Ezek.20.39|Ezek 20:39]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎האשׁרים‎</span> [[2Chr.24.18|2Chr 24:18]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עצבים‎</span> [[Ps.106.36|Ps 106:36]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פסיל(יםׅ‎</span> [[2Chr.33.22|2Chr 33:22]]; [[2Kgs.17.41|2Kgs 17:41]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פסל‎</span> [[2Kgs.97.7|2Kgs 97:7]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְ‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לבעל‎</span> [[Judg.2.13|Judg 2:13]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לאלהים אחרים‎</span> [[Jer.44.3|Jer 44:3]]. 

**5.** ***serve*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> ***with Levilical service*** (all [[BDB#P|P]]; compare [[BDB#RS|RS]]<sup>Sem i. 69</sup>): with accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עבד עֲבֹדָה‎</span> (see <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲבֹדָה‎</span>) [[Num.3.7|Num 3:7]]; [[Num.3.8|Num 3:8]]; [[Num.4.23|Num 4:23]]; [[Num.4.30|Num 4:30]]; [[Num.4.47|Num 4:47]]; [[Num.7.5|Num 7:5]]; [[Num.8.11|Num 8:11]]; [[Num.8.19|Num 8:19]]; [[Num.8.22|Num 8:22]]; [[Num.8.26|Num 8:26]]; [[Num.16.9|Num 16:9]]; [[Num.18.6|Num 18:6]]; [[Num.18.21|Num 18:21]]; [[Num.18.23|Num 18:23]]; [[Josh.22.27|Josh 22:27]] accusative omitted [[Num.4.24|Num 4:24]]; [[Num.4.26|Num 4:26]]; [[Num.4.37|Num 4:37]]; [[Num.4.41|Num 4:41]]; [[Num.8.15|Num 8:15]] (but [[BDB#Sam|⅏]] [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עבדה‎</span>), v[[Num.8.25|Num 8:25]]; [[Num.18.7|Num 18:7]]. **Niph\`al** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֶעְבָּ֑ד‎</span> [[Eccl.5.8|Eccl 5:8]] 2 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֶעֱבַדְתֶּם‎</span> [[Ezek.36.9|Ezek 36:9]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יֵעָבֵד‎</span> [[Deut.21.4|Deut 21:4]] 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תֵּעָבֵד‎</span> [[Ezek.36.34|Ezek 36:34]] — 

**1.** ***be tilled***, of land [[Deut.21.4|Deut 21:4]]; [[Ezek.36.9|Ezek 36:9]]; [[Ezek.36.34|Ezek 36:34]]. 

**2.** [[Eccl.5.8|Eccl 5:8]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֶלֶךְ לְשָׂדֶה נֶעְבָּ֑ד‎</span> dubious: a king for (devoted to) the ***cultivated*** field ([[BDB#Hi|Hi]]); a king ***that maketh himself servant*** to the field (devoted to agriculture), [[BDB#De|De]]<sup>see Commentaries</sup>, especially De. **Pual** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֻבַּד‎</span> [[Deut.21.3|Deut 21:3]]; [[Isa.14.3|Isa 14:3]] passive of **Qal**, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּ‎</span> impersonal [[Deut.21.3|Deut 21:3]] of a calf with which ***it has not been worked***; hard ***service*** with which it ***was worked with captives*** [[Isa.14.3|Isa 14:3]]. **Hiph\`il** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֶעֱבִיד‎</span> [[Ezek.29.18|Ezek 29:18]] 2 masculine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֶעֱבַדְתַּ֫נִי‎</span> [[Isa.43.24|Isa 43:24]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֶעֱבַדְתִּיךָ‎</span> v[[Isa.43.23|Isa 43:23]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְהַעֲבַדְתִּיךָ‎</span> [[Jer.17.4|Jer 17:4]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיַּעֲבֵד‎</span> [[2Chr.34.33|2Chr 34:33]] 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַעֲבִדוּ‎</span> [[Exod.1.13|Exod 1:13]] **Infinitive construct** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַעֲבִיד‎</span> [[2Chr.2.17|2Chr 2:17]] ***Participle*** plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַעֲבִדִים‎</span> [[Exod.6.15|Exod 6:15]] — 

**1.** ***compel to labour*** as slaves [[Exod.1.13|Exod 1:13]]; [[Exod.6.5|Exod 6:5]] ([[BDB#P|P]]) [[2Chr.2.17|2Chr 2:17]], + [[Gen.47.21|Gen 47:21]] (reading <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֶעֱבִיד לַעֲבָדִים‎</span>), [[2Sam.12.31|2Sam 12:31]] (reading <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְהֶעֱבִיד‎</span> + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּ‎</span> ***at***; on both these see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עבר‎</span> **Hiph\`il** near the end); ***cause to serve***, of army's service against, with accusative + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎(על)אל‎</span> [[Ezek.29.18|Ezek 29:18]] ***cause to labour, weary***, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּ‎</span> of means [[Isa.43.23|Isa 43:23]]; [[Isa.43.24|Isa 43:24]] (perhaps play on meanings **2, 3**). 

**2.** ***make to serve as subjects***, with 2 accusative [[Jer.17.4|Jer 17:4]], + [[Jer.15.14|Jer 15:14]] (read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְהַעֲבַרְתִּיךָ‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עבר‎</span> **Hiph\`il** near the end). 

**3.** ***cause to serve*** God [[2Chr.34.33|2Chr 34:33]]. **Hoph\`al** ***Imperfect*** 2 masculine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תָּֽעָבְדֵם‎</span> [[Exod.20.5|Exod 20:5]] = [[Deut.5.9|Deut 5:9]]; [[Exod.23.24|Exod 23:24]] 1 plural suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָָֽעָבְדֵם‎</span> [[Deut.13.3|Deut 13:3]] ([[BDB#Kö|Kö]]<sup>i. 259</sup> [[BDB#Sta|Sta]]<sup>§ 549 g</sup> [[BDB#Thes|Thes]]; &lt; [[BDB#Nes|Nes]]<sup>Marg. 12 f.</sup> Qal anomalously pointed (compare [[BDB#W|W]]<sup>AG. ed. 2, i, 62 n.</sup> [[BDB#Fl|Fl]]<sup>Kl. Schr. i. 98</sup>); [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:60»§ 60</sup> R. 1 [[BDB#Dr|Dr]] Qal falsely pointed as Hoph\`al); — ***be led*** or ***enticed to serve*** other gods [[Exod.20.5|Exod 20:5]] = [[Deut.5.9|Deut 5:9]]; [[Exod.23.24|Exod 23:24]]; [[Deut.13.8|Deut 13:8]].
